title: Card, "Holiday card", ca. 1980–95
medium: Lithograph on heavy paper; metal hinge
description: (a): Invitation with envelope; invitation is in the shape of a circular map of the earth as though an atlas with a metal hinge that opens into two semicircles to reveal the details of the invitation. In green and orange. (b): the envelope is white and square with text in orange and green: ART CENTER COLLEGE OF DESIGN 1700 LIDA STREET PASADENA / CALIFORNIA 91103.

tombstone.epitaph: Card, "Holiday card", ca. 1980–95. Lithograph on heavy paper; metal hinge. Gift of Rebeca Mendez. 1996-59-10-a,b.
